en-US: We strongly recommend you to try out the browser version first. Even if it lacks multi-document support, autosave and other features, it is still a good way to get familiar with the app. The coming desktop version will only be better than the browser version that you can try now. We're sure you will love it!
zh-CN: 我们强烈建议您先尝试浏览器版本。即使它缺少多文件支持、自动保存和其他功能，它仍然是提前熟悉新版操作的好方法。即将推出的桌面版本只会比您现在可以尝试的浏览器版本更好。我们相信你会喜欢它的！
